name: GymFistprint
description:
In this gym we love to train a lot and have sparring with people from all over the world, here old Martín, former professional boxer, will be the one who trains you to get the best out of you, you will test your agility, reflexes, concentration, coordination, patience, perseverance in The 3 machines that the gym offers so far include the punching bag, the speedbag and the dodgeball. Improve your stats like your strength, critical hits, aim, guard, and reflex while dodging blows to see them in action in combat. Your teammates will always give you good advice to raise your spirits and improve as a fighter and person, try to talk to them when they are taking a break.

Old Martín will turn you into a diamond, the only thing he asks is that you trust yourself.

Some advices:
-The game has autosave (local on PC)
-Training too much before a fight will cause your fighter's fatigue to affect his recovery in combat.
-Before a fight, the 3 best results of each machine in the gym are averaged, to consider your statistics in combat.
-After each fight the fighter eliminates his highest statistic and also eliminates his fatigue (if he does not abandon the fight) and can retrain for his next sparring.

Do not give up!


(I will be making future improvements, stay tuned for updates, this will only get better) Francisco Canales
